about_the_game:
Enter The Mansion
You've been sent to a haunted mansion in the mountains with the goal of fixing a nearby lighthouse. Monsters that live inside the mansion will do everything they can to stop you, and keep the lights off. You'll have to fight them off while repairing the generator, and getting out alive.


Unique Monsters
More monsters appear the deeper you go into the mansion, and they'll work together to catch you. All of the monsters have strengths and weaknesses you'll need to figure out to survive.


Features
  • Interact with fixable objects around the mansion using a point and click style interaction system.
  • Choose equipment to take with you before entering the mansion.
  • Survive against the monsters using only your Light Gun, and what you fix.
  • Do a good job, and get a higher grade on your report.
